original_solution_mapping.L1: She will read 20 pages / 4 = <<20/4=5>>5 pages for English.
original_solution_mapping.L2: She will read 16 pages / 4 = <<16/4=4>>4 pages for Science.
original_solution_mapping.L3: She will read 8 pages / 4 = <<8/4=2>>2 pages for Civics.
original_solution_mapping.L4: She will read 12 pages / 4 = <<12/4=3>>3 pages for Chinese.
original_solution_mapping.L5: Melody will read a total of 5 pages + 4 pages + 2 pages + 3 pages = <<5+4+2+3=14>>14 pages tomorrow.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4092.
    Returns: the total number of pages Melody will read tomorrow.
    """
    # L1
    english_pages = 20 # 20 pages for her English class
    fraction_denominator = 4 # one-fourth of the number of pages
    english_pages_tomorrow = english_pages / fraction_denominator

    # L2
    science_pages = 16 # 16 pages for her Science class
    science_pages_tomorrow = science_pages / fraction_denominator

    # L3
    civics_pages = 8 # 8 pages for her Civics
    civics_pages_tomorrow = civics_pages / fraction_denominator

    # L4
    chinese_pages = 12 # 12 pages for Chinese class
    chinese_pages_tomorrow = chinese_pages / fraction_denominator

    # L5
    total_pages_tomorrow = english_pages_tomorrow + science_pages_tomorrow + civics_pages_tomorrow + chinese_pages_tomorrow

    # FA
    answer = total_pages_tomorrow
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: She will read {english_pages} pages / {fraction_denominator} = <<{english_pages}/{fraction_denominator}={english_pages_tomorrow}>>{english_pages_tomorrow} pages for English.
She will read {science_pages} pages / {fraction_denominator} = <<{science_pages}/{fraction_denominator}={science_pages_tomorrow}>>{science_pages_tomorrow} pages for Science.
She will read {civics_pages} pages / {fraction_denominator} = <<{civics_pages}/{fraction_denominator}={civics_pages_tomorrow}>>{civics_pages_tomorrow} pages for Civics.
She will read {chinese_pages} pages / {fraction_denominator} = <<{chinese_pages}/{fraction_denominator}={chinese_pages_tomorrow}>>{chinese_pages_tomorrow} pages for Chinese.

Melody will read a total of {english_pages_tomorrow} pages + {science_pages_tomorrow} pages + {civics_pages_tomorrow} pages + {chinese_pages_tomorrow} pages = <<{english_pages_tomorrow}+{science_pages_tomorrow}+{civics_pages_tomorrow}+{chinese_pages_tomorrow}={total_pages_tomorrow}>>{total_pages_tomorrow} pages tomorrow.
